Package pacman.util

Class MapConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.util.MapConfig
  • public class MapConfig
extends java.lang.Object

    MapConfig

    A MapConfig is an object consisting of configuration of maps.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Song Zhang
    See Also:
    Map
